fda_announcement: FDA Statement: We are aware of a recent manufacturing disruption affecting one producer of the product class. Current data indicate overall supply remains adequate. We are monitoring the situation and urge all manufacturers and supply-chain partners to continue timely, voluntary reporting of production and inventory levels so that we can respond quickly if conditions change.

The FDA is closely monitoring emerging supply constraints for this medication following a recent manufacturer disruption. We encourage all manufacturers to provide updated production and inventory data and remind healthcare providers to order responsibly to maintain equitable access. At this time, the FDA does not recommend stockpiling.

The FDA is closely monitoring supply levels of [drug name]. Current data indicate adequate national inventory; however, an isolated manufacturer disruption has been identified. We encourage all manufacturers and distributors to provide timely production and inventory updates through established reporting channels. Healthcare providers and purchasers are advised to maintain standard ordering practices and avoid stockpiling.
